text: Adolfo Larrue Mart√≠nez III (born September 27, 1948) is an American actor and singer. He acted in the daytime soap operas Santa Barbara, General Hospital, One Life to Live, The Bold and the Beautiful, and Days of Our Lives. Martinez plays Mayo in the television series Queen of the South. In June 2022, Martinez was cast as Master Pakku in the Netflix live-action series Avatar: The Last Airbender. His father was Mexican with Apache descent while his mother was of Northern European descent. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Glendale, California Category:Singers from California Category:Emmy Award winning actors
